Product Information
ULTRA HD 4K RESOLUTION
Four times the resolution. Four times the detail.
ULTRA HD 4K resolution is four times that of Full HD, resulting in brilliant clarity and vivid details that amaze, even up close. Enjoy a new standard of definition.

4K UPSCALER
Scale new heights of resolution.
The 4K Upscaler converts lower resolution entertainment to near 4K quality using a unique 6-step image processing technology. So whether it's broadcasts, movies, sports or more, you can now enjoy it in incredible detail.
Ribbon Plate Stand
Sturdy stand
Form follows function with this sturdy and elegant Ribbon Plate Stand.
HDMI 4K
Future proof your TV
HDMI 4K can transmit large amounts of data at once. This advanced technology supports 4K video with 60 frames per second, which is the standard for UHD broadcasting. Be ready for the UHD experience for HDMI 4K.
Virual Surround
Put yourself in the middle of the action with Virtual Surround that delivers an extended sound field.

- mixmixi

Refurbished
Refurbished items are customer returns. They might for example, be unwanted gifts, ex-display or products where customers have simply changed their mind. Product identified by Tesco Outlet as "refurbished" are products that have been returned to Tesco stores.
Minor cosmestic marks (Grade C products will have Major cosmetic marks)
Original retail box or replacement box may be marked or scuffed
Fully functional test and factory reset (if necessary)
All products are supplied with basic accessories to use the product (unless stated in the listing)
Professionally refurbished
12 month Tesco Outlet warranty
All items sold have been classified by our certified testing facilities where they are examined, fully tested, and if necessary, refurbished, repaired and repackaged in to a generic brown box.
All refurbished products have been priced to show a fantastic saving to the original RRP.
